messages.title: Our country needs a strong opposition
messages.content: The Conservatives plan to cut schools and hospital funding and Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are too weak and divided to do anything about it. Only MIKE ROSS and the Liberal Democrats will provide the effective opposition that will stop the Conservatives and get a better deal for our area. Mike said: 'Jeremy Corbyn’s weak leadership means the Tories think they can get away with doing what they like. It means further cuts to our NHS and local schools. Another Labour MP here will change nothing. It’ll mean more Jeremy Corbyn and years of Conservative cuts with no real opposition. This election is your chance to change that. A Lib Dem MP here will help deliver the strong opposition our area and our country needs.'

issues.health: stop further cuts to our NHS

community.content: Only the Lib Dems can deliver the strong opposition the country needs.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn’s weak leadership means the Tories think they can get away with doing what they like. It means further cuts to our NHS and local schools. Another Labour MP here will change nothing. It’ll mean more Jeremy Corbyn and years of Conservative cuts with no real opposition.

images.caption: Help MIKE ROSS win in North Hull
Only the Lib Dems can deliver the strong opposition the country needs
